website_summaries.verdict: High level of protein per serving that helps with muscle gains when you’re on a workout regimen.
pros: Has a chocolate coconut flavor that most people like
Gives you 25 grams of protein and 5.5 grams of BCAAs per serving to help with faster muscle recovery after tough workouts
Reasonable price per ounce versus some other coconut powders
Low amounts of carbs, fats, and sugars
cons: Occasional consistency issues with the powder’s texture and taste

customer_reviews.title: THE MOST DELICIOUS PROTEIN POWDER!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried over 6 vanilla protein powders and I have truly hated them all. Everyone says chocolate powders are so much better, but I hate chocolate. A friend told me about this brand and the birthday cake flavor and I had to try it. My mind was blown. It legit tastes like the halo top birthday cake ice cream! With less than 1g of sugar and 25g of protein. I love it! I WILL be buying more! I'm addicted! :)
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Warren

customer_reviews.title: Bugs in protein
customer_reviews.text: I found crawling little bugs in my protein! I read other reviews and thought it might have been a bad batch, plus most people found bugs in vanilla. Mine in fudge browny flavor, as i looked closer into scoop, bugs are all over! Im so mad, wtf Dymatize?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stay Away from Chocolate Coconut
customer_reviews.text: I still enjoy Dymatize as a whole, but the Chocolate Coconut is tragic. I have consistently ordered Dymatize for about a year. To date, I've been satisfied with, or outright loved the flavors I have ordered, until Chocolate Coconut. I have had a lot of proteins from different lines and this is the worst-tasting protein I have ever encountered. At this stage, I'm just trying to survive this huge tub of protein I'm stuck with, and can honestly say I will never make the mistake of ordering this flavor again. And this is coming from someone who will eat, drink, inhale anything that hints of chocolate and/or coconut.
customer_reviews.author: L. L.

customer_reviews.title: Black particles in the product
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I bough this product. And I noticed that it tasted different, a little bitter. So I looked closely in the product and noticed that there are black particles along with the powder. I posted a question if this a normal variation to the product and no one has reached out to me for an answer.
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely disgusting.
customer_reviews.text: I have been drinking this product, from bodybuilding.com or Vitamin Shoppe, every single day for almost 2 years now. I absolutely love the taste of it, but never will I buy it off Amazon again. I don't know if it's old or what but it tastes NOTHING like it normally does. It's gross and I almost throw up everytime I drink it. I will be throwing it out today, 100%. It's a shame because I spent the money on it just to throw it away. DO NOT PURCHASE THIS PRODUCT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle B

customer_reviews.title: This taste like summer's after chasing the ice cream truck!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tasting protein (Orange Dreamsicle) I have had in a LONG time. I have had the chocolate from them and Its taste odd. But this one is AMAZING. It tastes like a melted creamsicle! A little trick--make some extra and pour it into popsicle molds and freeze...VOILA you have an amazing frozen treat that is healthy, low in sugar and offers incredible relief after a workout! (see picture)
customer_reviews.author: CDJamerson

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to me by my nutritionist as I work toward my weight loss goal. It taste fine, but, evendors when using a little extra water, it still doesn't always dissolve. I also don't understand why it comes in a huge bottle and is like half full; that just seems wasteful to me. Other than that, I have no problems. I use it three times a day, so it runs out quickly, so I bought the 3lb container (again, huge container, about a 2/3rds full).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Thing Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously the best protein powder I’ve ever tried. How does it taste so good? I love this so much. All the flavors are amazing. It’s NOT too sweet like some reviewers said. If you’re used to flavorless protein then yeah your taste buds will be shocked at how good this is! I also love the fact that it’s hydrolyzed, I can really tell a difference between hydrolyzed and non-hydrolyzed protein after my workouts. I build muscle so much quicker. No it’s not a gimmick. Please make more flavors I will buy every single one!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Taste Great...but too sweet..
customer_reviews.text: I received my protein a few minutes ago and it was time for a meal. I have the orange dreamsicle and this stuff is really tasty! I must admit that it is super sweet to me. That is the reason I didn't give it 5 stars. I was worried about the negative reviews and hoped that I didn't have any of the issues many have had. So far so good. I'll provide and update in 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: Mom On A Mission

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate peanut butter is good but....
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to receive this product! As I see everyone used this particular brand. Especially after reading a lot of the reviews. Unfortunately for me, this protein made me very sick. I had stomach cramps, bloating, and uncontrollable horrid protein farts. After figuring out it was the protein that made me sick, I did research and found that it is due to the amount of lactose in the protein. So just do your research because now I’m stuck with it. The flavor however is VERY DELICIOUS
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for muscle builders, weight loss, and bariatric surgery patients!
customer_reviews.text: Great taste, lactose free, minimal fat and sugar. Add liquid vitamins, like Nature’s Way Alive, lactose free skim milk, LifeTime liquid D, and SCS Liquid Reviva Calcium for a delicious power shake. This makes for a fantastic workout shake, diet shake, or in my case, for the perfect post bariatric surgery supplement shake!
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: Tastes gross!
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty excited to try this protein powder. I will say it mixes well, but MAN the Gourmet Chocolate tastes gross! I have a really hard time choking it down. It just tastes so artificially sweet and the smell is also just way too unnatural and not to mention super pungent. I always finish any supplements I buy because they're expensive and I don't want to waste money... but I'm going to have to call it quits on this one! I really can't stand it! Maybe the other flavors are okay, but two thumbs down for Gourmet Chocolate.
customer_reviews.author: Megan D

customer_reviews.title: Lactose problems
customer_reviews.text: Whey protein isolate should, in theory, be lactose free. Other reviewers have explained this better. Flavor was good and consistency was good but I had marked symptoms of lactose intolerance after consumption.
customer_reviews.author: Hank S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Protein Powder
customer_reviews.text: Sweet and effective, this is one of the best protein powders I have found throughout many years of trying a variety of brands and flavors. ISO 100 dissolves well in water or milk, it's smooth to drink, and doesn't cause unwanted GI issues for my wife or me. We both love this flavor because it's a bit sweeter than vanilla but doesn't have that "fake" taste. I've been using this for a few months now and it seems to work well.
customer_reviews.author: Roanoke9000

customer_reviews.title: Trust ya GUT! This is awesome stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I use it everyday! All day.... Tried all TOP name brands, popular & not so popular.... this Dyna is 👍🏼 I LOVE IT! Have to stop listening to all the HYPE about others & give this a sip ..... I put it in my coffee, tea, oats, yogurt - everything!!! No belly problems, no weight gain. Have only tried the VANILLA & BIRTHDAY 🎂 so far.... LOVE ❤️ both, Bday cake favorite! plan on trying ALL flavors! I’m a keeper with this one & NOT looking back anymore 👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼 Trust ya GUT people 😂 💪🏾
customer_reviews.author: DenIMGood

customer_reviews.title: LISTEN TO THE PEOPLE
customer_reviews.text: In a lot of the reviews, it has people stating that Fruity Pebbles is sooo good and it's the best flavor. I was skeptical. I stuck to other flavors...always getting tired of them after about a week...always having to add things to them just to tolerate them. But not Fruit Pebbles! It's just like drinking the milk after a bowl of most fruity cereals. It never gets old. And when it's cold, i can drink it all day if i had to. You could mix it in with your milk when you eat fruity cereals. At this point, i don't plan on drinking any other flavor ever again.
customer_reviews.author: RJJ

customer_reviews.title: ... wanted to give it a try and I wasn’t disappointed! The strawberry dymatize tastes exactly like a strawberry ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always stayed away from strawberry flavors because they never taste quite right but I wanted to give it a try and I wasn’t disappointed! The strawberry dymatize tastes exactly like a strawberry milkshake. I only mix with water because I think milk makes it too thick. I love the formula of this powder as well and see the best results when using this product. I’ve tried many other brands and this is my favorite. By far my favorite flavor of dymatize.
customer_reviews.author: kristin

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: I've had a protein shake for breakfast for about 15 years now. So you can imagine how many I've tried. This is absolutely the best formula I've ever used. Super low carbs and only 1 gram of sugar. Mixes like a dream and is so smooth and creamy. I mix it with unsweetened protein enriched flaxmilk. My favorite flavor is the peanut butter. Absolutely a 5 star product! Delicious! And somehow this formula curbs sweet cravings.
customer_reviews.author: Becca Miller

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Not good protein we normally buy this at gnc this is not the same product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Taste
customer_reviews.text: Limited Edition Chocolate Caramel is delicious! I will be stocking up and also hoping they keep this flavor permanently. I did not find this flavor to be as overly sweet as other ISO-100 flavors, Birthday Cake for example.
customer_reviews.author: A Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Good Taste and Nutritional Values
customer_reviews.text: For the past few years I have been a loyal customer of a competitor, but decided to give Dymatize ISO 100 Whey protein a try to switch things up. In general, the chocolate flavor is quite good. I usually ad a tablespoon of peanut butter with other supplements for my protein shake. Taste is on point and nutrition values compares to any other of the major supplement vendors. I would recommend this protein powder to people based on nutritional values and taste (chocolate). I give it a 4 of 5 stars due to the cost being a bit higher versus some competitors.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly great taste
customer_reviews.text: This review is for the Fruity Pebbles flavor. Dymatize ISO 100 has always been solid for ingredient quality and ease of blending even without a shaker ball. I purchased the Fruity Pebbles flavor as a joke for my workout partner but found that the flavor is _really_ good -- it tastes just like fruit cereal in milk. Vanilla is also great, but there are many companies that make a solid vanilla. Not bitterness, not aftertaste, a perfect protein supplement!
customer_reviews.author: H. Tolley

customer_reviews.title: Great Whey Isolate Protein
customer_reviews.text: I am competing for an upcoming show so I switched from your standard whey to an isolate. I wanted something more pure since I am dialing in my physique. I found that most isolates are more expensive and vary in ingredients. Dymatize ISO 100 chocolate peanut butter tastes great, is free of extra chemicals, and you get more for your money. I highly recommend it if you are competing, otherwise stick to the standard whey and save your money. Dymatize puts out great products and now they have a new consumer!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Love It in Yogurt!
customer_reviews.text: The flavor definitely tastes just like Fruity Pebbles! No weird aftertaste either. My only small complaint is that mixing one scoop with just 6oz of liquid (I use cashew almond milk blend) is a little unsatisfying in quantity (it did satisfy my hunger, just wham bam - done). I decided to try mixing the powder with 6oz of plain Greek yogurt instead, and it's SO GOOD! It tastes like a treat and there's a little more opportunity to savor the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Best Tasting Whey Supplement in the market
customer_reviews.text: The best tasting whey supplement out there, period. My personal tip is to mix it with coconut water instead of mil or water. Coconut water will taste as good as milk when mixed with Iso 100 (hard to believe but it's true) and I've been told that milk takes away part of the benefits of the whey supplements, don't know about that. It's a pleasure to look forward to having a great chocolate shake after a hard workout!
customer_reviews.author: Maru Cheferrino

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough good things about this protein powder! I have tried multiple ones before this and I’m always disappointed. I’m especially not a chocolate flavor kinda person and typically go for more vanilla based, so I knew I had to try the birthday cake flavor. Let me tell you, it’s been life changing! It’s the right amount of sweet and you can’t even tell you’re drinking protein powder. Not to mention, the macros are phenomenal on this one. Please buy!
customer_reviews.author: Selena C.

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again, and try new flavors.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Fruit Pebbles flavor because why not? It sounded amazing! It's definitely got smell of Fruity Pebbles, super spot on. The flavor is a good 4 out of 5, it tastes like Fruity Pebbles, but it also tastes like protein powder. I actually don't make this as a drink, I mix it into cottage cheese. 10/10 would order again. I also plan to try Cocoa Pebbles to see if they taste like Cocoa Pebbles or if they just taste like generic chocolate protein.
customer_reviews.author: HC

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, healthy, nutritious
customer_reviews.text: We love this protein. We’ve tried several brand of whey protein and have settled on this one. We have tried this in both chocolate and vanilla I highly recommend both. The vanilla we mix into our smoothies and it gives a healthy added boost of protein to a fruit smoothie. The chocolate we normally just mix with water but it taste like a chocolate milkshake. Hope this review was helpful let me know if you have any questions!
customer_reviews.author: The Fair Critic

customer_reviews.title: YUM!
customer_reviews.text: Luv this stuff! It tastes incredible despite there's little to no sugar in it. Also, it has no wonky bitter taste afterward, easy to mix in the blender or hand shaken in a bottle. What made this product stand out above all the protein powders on the market and a huge plus about this product....NO gassy side effects or bloating!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimiko

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting high quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the good stuff. I have tried the Strawberry and the Gourmet Chocolate. Both are excellent. The wife and I mix ours with water and some MCT oil for keto. The wife said the Gourmet Chocolate was the best chocolate protein she's had. She's trying the Strawberry for the first time today. I am sure she will love it. I have issues with standard whey so we get the isolate and I don't have any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Mango Meh

customer_reviews.title: Cinnamon Bun Is Foul
customer_reviews.text: I feel like we wasted a ton of money on this product because the cinnamon bun flavor is SO SWEET it's unpalatable. It was actually making my husband sick, so we forked out more cash for Isopure Strawberries and Cream. We work out in the morning so that cloyingly sweet taste is just far too much. We tried mixing it with coffee as well but it wasn't enough. Otherwise, it dissolves well, it isn't chalky at all. I'm afraid to buy a different flavor though in case the overwhelming sweet chemical flavor is in every kind. If anyone has insight on this, I'd love to hear it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TASTE IS AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed with stuff! I can't believe it has virtually no carbs, and tastes this great! I bought it for recipes, but haven't gotten around to making anything yet. But, I have been putting it in unsweetened almond and cashew milk, and it is delicious! There is a slight sweetness to it, just the right amount. I was prepared to put sweetener in the drink, but when I tasted it, I didn't need to. Sometimes I make it on the thick side and use it as my dessert. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: KT@AmazonFan

customer_reviews.title: Best overall
customer_reviews.text: Having gone through many variations of brand, price, protein type, and flavors, Dymatize hits the mark on all of them. Blends instantly in a shaker, tastes really good (like Frankenberry cereal milk), great price by comparison, and NO bloating whatsoever. A little part of me would like it to be pink, but that would be artificial flavors, so I got over it. Will look to the casein next to balance out the intake plan. Pretty sure once the canisters of the others are used up (or given away), I'll be switching to Dymatize exclusively.
customer_reviews.author: Peter D.

customer_reviews.title: Good protein, worst flavor ever.
customer_reviews.text: I always buy Dymatize ISO 100. Making a smoothie or protein shake with their products used to be my reward for a great workout. With the new look containers it seemed to have lost some of its flavor. It is a good quality protein that I will continue to use but I don't recommend ever buying the fruity pebbles flavor. Imagine making a bowl of less sweet fruity pebbles mixed with water. Mixing with almond milk does not help. I love fruity pebbles cereal by the way. I have 5 pounds of this stuff to get through. Maybe it will grow on me but for now, sorry Dymatize you have to get 4 stars for this flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Crain

customer_reviews.title: Yummmmmayyy
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I’m an avid O.N buyer but when I seen the fruity pebbles flavor I HAD to try. I’m really trying to stay away from the sweets and this has been a great alternative for me. I have never tasted a protein powder that tastes a delish as this! Seriously! After reading the reviews & everyone saying the same I had to try. And YES it does live up to the hype. I’ve mixed it with water and it STILL tastes just like the cereal. So imagine with some almond milk. I’m deff going back for the coco pebbles!
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Get cookies and cream
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this, I was afraid the flavor would be so strong that it would get old really quickly as that's what happens with many protein powders for me. According to user recommendations, cookies and cream with almond milk is delicious. So I opted to try that one. The reviews are correct. It is delicious and not overpowering. I could drink this regularly and it's not too sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Iv tried several brands and flavors. This one by far surpasses them. Great test, mixes well, doesn’t clump, even when u do 2 scoops with at least 10oz’s. I can take it before or after working out, it doesn’t cause me any GI issues or bloating, so really great there. All in all, its great... haven’t tried any other flavors than “Chocolate Peanut Butter” because i just really don’t want to waste money or be disappointed... So im sticking with it. Im halfway through my third 5lb container... Its a rock solid protein brand. Only issue, It could be slightly cheaper... like under 55 and I would’ve given it 5 stars all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Dymatized
customer_reviews.text: Overall really good. I have lactose intolerance so normal Whey Protein supplements cause me “issues”. So when it comes to buying Whey Protein Isolate, which is more processed and easier to digest with lactose intolerance, it can be pretty pricey. Dymatized makes the best bang for your buck. It’s cheaper than other stuff on the market. As for the taste, brownie wasn’t as mind blowingly good as I expected. It’s more-or-less tasted the same as the chocolate, if not slightly sweeter. Still love this product though and plan on purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: CripSwag

customer_reviews.title: Best Protein Shakes Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I used GNC AMP protein for 20 years until they changed their ingredients. It started to bother my stomach, so I have been searching for a new protein powder and now my search is over. Dymatize tastes great, with several different flavors to choose from. Chocolate Peanut Butter, Fudge Brownie and Vanilla are out of this world. They taste like a milk shake. It has a lot of protein and is a great price. I have noticed gains with this protein and will continue to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph DAli

customer_reviews.title: Sinfully Delish
customer_reviews.text: Purchased: Fruity Pebble-- I knew this would be good but I was shocked at how good! To me it's like an actual milkshake(blended with almond milk and ice) and I use it as meal replacement. My container was just manufactured in July 2020 and I checked it thoroughly for bugs as some reviews stated theirs had that- nothing but delicious light powder. I read you can make cookies with these powders- help! :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing taste
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to this whole protein powder thing, but I read a lot of different reviews before settling in on trying this product. I've tried the Cinnamon Bun and the Chocolate Peanut Butter. Both taste absolutely amazing. I've had no stomach issues or anything like some mention in other products. This is only my second or third week but I'm pretty sure I'll be using this product indefinitely now.
customer_reviews.author: JMC1972

customer_reviews.title: WAY too sweet
customer_reviews.text: I have a mixed opinion of this. On the one hand, it dissolves well, keeps me satisfied, and has all the right nutritional stats for my purposes. I feel that it’s good quality. On the other hand, the flavor (cake batter) is so insanely atrociously sweet, I can hardly stand it. I mix it with three times as much water as called for, and still the sweetness is intolerable. I’m hoping to be able to choke down the rest of the can, but it will be a struggle. I can’t have chocolate, so my flavor options are limited. I generally like cake batter flavored ice cream, so I thought I would try this. I won’t purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: MBW

customer_reviews.title: Best protein powder
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried just about every protein on the market and they all left me with intestinal discomfort and worse... I haven’t experienced any adverse symptoms with Dymatize ISO 100. It tastes amazing (Orange Creamsicle), mixes easily in a shaker bottle with water and goes down like juice with no chemical after taste. If you have digestive issues and/or can’t tolerate other protein powders, definitely give this one a try! Extremely high quality and underrated protein powder!
customer_reviews.author: A.T.

customer_reviews.title: Mixes great and easy to drink💪💪💪🦵🦵🦵
customer_reviews.text: A great protein powder for before & after working out. I take a scoop with my preworkout drink and a scoop with my post-workout shake (along with a scoop of micronized creatine). Unlike many protein powders, it mixes quickly and doesn't give you that 'thick' chalky protein drink. Nice flavor. For me it's one of the protein I buy it. I try many different protein but this one it's so good. I hop u guys enjoy it❤❤❤
customer_reviews.author: cherif el ouarti

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Like Chocolate Milk!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to try this protein because I have purchased a variety of proteins that I just cannot put down. I have a big problem with texture and this protein did not disappoint! I just mix it with cold water and it tastes just like chocolate milk to me. It mixes smoothly and isn't thick. There's no lingering aftertaste. I would highly recommend this protein for those that may be hesitant. I also go the strawberry flavor and think the chocolate is slightly better tasting.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lai

customer_reviews.title: Best protein I've used in years
customer_reviews.text: I have tried proteins from Optimum Nutrition, MyProtein, Cellucor, NitroTech, Pro Action, Body Fortress, and many others and this has been my favorite protein. The big things I look for are mixing ability, taste, and grams of protein per dollar. This protein mixes easily and quickly. I mix with a spoon and within seconds all chunks are completely go. As far as taste goes, I haven't had another protein that is better (I've had Chocolate and Chocolate-Peanut Butter). And while this protein is relatively expensive, it's been worth it for the reasons above and because it doesn't make me nauseous
customer_reviews.author: Tyler W.

customer_reviews.title: Gourmet vanilla is perfect - not too sweet and great w unsweetened almond milk
customer_reviews.text: Mixes in a shaker bottle very quickly- using a fork in a glass takes a little while longer, but it will mix and not stay clumpy. The gourmet vanilla is excellent if you choose to avoid overly sweet tasting shakes and it blends with anything.
customer_reviews.author: KBChicago

customer_reviews.title: Fruity Pebble Protein is a game changer
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking whey protein supplements on & off for 20 years. This is by far the best tasting, most nutritions, and best digesting protein powder I’ve ever had. I’ve mixed this with water & almond milk without any issues. It’s extremely mixable. I have no plans of buying anything other than Dymatize Fruit Pebble for years to come...or until it gets discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas J Paterson Sr.

customer_reviews.title: GROSS
customer_reviews.text: I feel like there's two types of people who take a protein. Those who stick with Optimum Gold Standard and those who try other brands. I fall into the second category, I've tried a number of different flavors from a number of different brands, and this ONE flavor takes the cake as one of the grossest I've ever tried. I originally tried this brand with the Orange Dreamsicle, which is still one of my favorites, but as of my last purchase there was a $30 premium on the size I typically pick up, hence the differently flavor. But please for the love of all that is good, DO NOT BUY THIS FLAVOR.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Barana

customer_reviews.title: Yum yum yum!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. With less than 1g of sugar and 25g of protein this is a perfect supplement with my keto diet. I use the gourmet chocolate flavor with 6oz of unsweetened vanilla milk and a 1/4 tsp of pb power powder . It tastes delicious. I use it immediately following a workout or occasionally as a meal substitute for breakfast as I'm not a big breakfast eater. It's convenient, easy to make, and delicious. I've been ordering this product regularly for 2 years (in various sizes) and have never had any issues with it with it having bugs or being open or black dots in it like others have. I have been buying it and will continue to!
customer_reviews.author: RoPo

customer_reviews.title: Great Anytime
customer_reviews.text: I got this (in peanut butter chocolate) so that I could get the most out of my time at the gym, but after realizing that it 1) tastes like candy 2) keeps me feeling full for a long time and 3) is a relatively guilt-free snack, I've been having 2-3 shakes a day and putting it in other things like cereal and oatmeal just to add some flavor. I'm very lactose-sensitive and have little to no discomfort depending on how fast I drink it– but protein farts afterwards are unavoidable no matter what powder you choose lol. Can't recommend enough!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole René

customer_reviews.title: Fruity pebbles!!!!
customer_reviews.text: FLAVOR IS ON POINT! I love fruity pebbles so I was skeptical before trying this but WOW. The first time I tried it I used 6oz water and it was amazing. The second time I put it in unsweetened vanilla almond milk and it was LIFE CHANGING. Get it!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Rose

customer_reviews.title: Best protein I have had.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many different types of proteins that you will find at GNC. My friend is an amateur bodybuilder and recommended this brand for its purity in protein. Most other proteins have fillers and people do not realize what they are consuming even myself until I educated myself a little. I always look at the ingredient list and ISO100 is so far the best. I have ordered twice of the birthday cake flavor and I enjoy it very much so. I never got a bad batch.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Failed for me, Could work for you!
customer_reviews.text: I don't see anything really wrong with the product. There is something wrong with me. I used this product for 1month and It constantly gave me stomach bloating and gas(I have IBS). My stomach is very sensitive and it didn't react well to this. I had a product before this that Worked amazing but, The price to amount ratio for this product was to good to pass up the test.... I gave the rest to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Tison

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This flavor is a game-changer! I make my own juice (usually beets, carrots and apples) and add a scoop of this with some coconut milk and wow is it good! I get all of the nutrients I need and feel content for hours. I've used vanilla protein powders off and on for years, and I don't think I will ever go back. Great find!
customer_reviews.author: Cycle Mom

customer_reviews.title: Gourmet chocolate is delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Love the gourmet chocolate flavor. Tastes excellent in cold brew coffee -- like a cold mocha! Also good just with water -- add a half-teaspoon of xantham gum and blend well to give it a thicker consistency (with almost no calories added)!
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Flavor is on point! Gourmet Chocolate
customer_reviews.text: I’m a mom of 2 boys. It’s only been a month that I gave birth. I’m trying to get on track with my eating habits, and working out. This Gourmet Chocolate flavor is so good. I’m looking to incorporate a shake or two a day, along with eating keto. The shake was so good!! I’ve tried BPI in different flavors, and other brands from GNC. Let me just say this is my favorite. For me flavor is a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Andy & Ari Mosqueda

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it, the chocolate one tastes so good!
customer_reviews.text: I like how it’s very easy to open & comes with a scooper. It’s not filled to the top with powder (85% full) but I still believe it’s worth it. The chocolate one tastes delicious, especially with almond milk!
customer_reviews.author: Celine Co

customer_reviews.title: nice taste but still too sweet for me
customer_reviews.text: this is very nice product, I bought 5 different flavors and loved Vanilla and Orange, Cinnamon and birthday cake are nice in taste (cinnamon is much nicer than birthday cake) but too sweet for me which gave me the feeling that I am drinking too much sugar however after checking the nutrition facts found out it says it's all sugar alcohol that even me more bad feeling of thinking I am taking too much chemicals in!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste
customer_reviews.text: Truly one of the best tasting ones I have had. I can’t wait to try the other flavors! Highly recommend helps rebuild muscle faster after work outs, and a great replacement for a meal, keeps you feeling full up to 4 hrs. If your not real hungry but kinda hungry and don’t know what you want. Drink one of theses it will hold you over and gives you that little bit of sweetness one craves.
customer_reviews.author: Ken larson

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: This protein powder is the most smooth and most delicious tasting out of any protein powder I’ve bought. I have birthday cake, fudge brownie, and peanutbutter. All are absolutely delicious and blend so well with a blender bottle. I drink one protein shake a day. This is definitely my go-to protein powder. I can’t wait to try Cinnamon Bun.
customer_reviews.author: Jars59

customer_reviews.title: My favorite protein
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing brand and this is my favorite flavor. It mixes well but you need to mix with cold liquids. if you mix with hot like coffee you need to use a blender because that will make it chunky unlike with Milk/Silk or ice water. with milk it literally tastes like a chocolate milkshake and this is the best price around unless there is a major sale.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth bullard

customer_reviews.title: high number of servings, no extra crap, and tastes GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Between the number of servings, the lack of unnecessary sugars and calories, and the phenomenal taste, this powder is a knockout. Excellent product. It's bulking season so I've switched to a gainer, but I'll be coming back to this in January/February. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: There isn't much to complain except I personally thinks the flavor is a little too sweet.
customer_reviews.text: I am not a professional trainer and only use this for my weight loss routine. The powder seems to help with my weight loss and muscle gain. I usually take a scoop with milk for breakfast and sometimes after workout with water. There isn't much to complain except I personally thinks the flavor is a little too sweet.
customer_reviews.author: ProphecyX

customer_reviews.title: USE A SHAKER!
customer_reviews.text: I initially tried using this by stirring with a spoon and the clumps made this feel impossible to consume and would build up on your teeth cement-like. I put it in coffee once and it was gross. With the use of a ball shaker and the small amount of water that the directions recommend, it's a lot more doable. However, I will look into trying other flavors in much smaller containers until I find one I like. As far as quality, I feel like it does what it's supposed to. I just wish it tasted better.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great protein
customer_reviews.text: I have tried coco pepples,chocolate peanut butter, Carmel and Cookies and Cream. All mix well some better than other but all better than any other brand I have tried. All taste great expect cookies and cream which doesn't taste bad its just not the best I wouldn't buy that flavor again. I need to be lactose free an i have no problems with this protein. Also have never seen any bugs i don't know what other people are talking about. The ceasin is all good but doesn't mix as well but better than other ceasin protein.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting protein ever!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this protein - it is the first protein that I have ever had that I don't mind mixing with just plain water. It mixes so well, even without a shaker, and it tastes like it can't be good for you! I have used Dymatize's regular protein before for the taste, but it never mixed that well. This ISO 100 is fantastic!! Well worth the money, AND it's a quality protein to boot!
customer_reviews.author: C. W.

customer_reviews.title: Nasty Flavor! Pass this one up.
customer_reviews.text: I was lured into buying this by all the good reviews. This tastes like burnt artificial sweetener. I dont understand how people can like this. Do they not have taste buds? It was so disgusting and the aftertaste lingered for hours even after I ate something else. Would never buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Tamerin

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor
customer_reviews.text: Love this protein powder! Have found the flavor is much better than other brands! Even taste good just mixed with water (although I prefer to mix mine with almond milk if I am drinking it). Also great for backing with! Have added it to my pancakes, waffles, oatmeal, and cookies!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Sussman

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great. Easy on digestion
customer_reviews.text: I’ve done a lot of research on protein powders to try. I purchased this one because I was having issues with bloating with another brand. I compared the ingredients and this seemed better. Not knowing how this would blend or taste was a risk. This was so Good. I blended it with water and a 6 strawberries. It tasted like ice cream. I can't say enough positive things. Definitely going to purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: P. Keller

customer_reviews.title: Great flavors
customer_reviews.text: I use several varieties of the Dymatize protein powder, I’ve used a number of these powders over the years but this is the only one that never has bothered my stomach and it rates high as far as protein powders go, may favorite flavors are fudge brownie, and orange creamsicle, I like both the vanilla and the banana flavors, the vanilla I mix with one banana, and the vanilla I mix with blueberries, a couple of ice cubes, 8 ounces of water in a blender and you get a great smoothie do recommend
customer_reviews.author: Inspdan

customer_reviews.title: Easy on the tummy but doesn't blend well
customer_reviews.text: I got this in Vanilla because it's lactose free and the powder I had been using (Optimum Nutrition Gold Standard 100% Whey) was giving me digestive problems. This one doesn't taste as good as Gold Standard though, and it definitely doesn't blend as well: no matter how much I shake the BlenderBottle, I always end up swallowing a few dry clumps. I do think it's easier on my tummy, but I'm still looking for a better protein powder.
customer_reviews.author: Jina K. Chan

customer_reviews.title: Too Sweet!
customer_reviews.text: I am a peanut butter lover so I thought this would be great. It's way too sweet for me. I add a pinch of pink Himalayan salt and it's good that way, but it's something I became easily tired of. Also, I thought maybe it was just this flavor, I switch to fudge brownie and it's worse. If you don't like excessively sweet avoid this brand. It does what it says though, I can go as hard as I want and I'm only a little sore the next day :)
customer_reviews.author: Amanda J

customer_reviews.title: The tastiest protein in the game.
customer_reviews.text: I've been active and working out for 15+ years. I have tried every protein known to man.... While at the end of the day you just gotta get it in.. This product sure makes it more enjoyable! It mixes extremely well, not chalky or super sweet tasting. It is good with water, but like a dessert with almond milk! I sometimes mix one up after dinner for a treat haha The fruity pebbles is awesome! I've had both the fruity and the chocolate, I prefer the Fruity! 10/10 recommend this protein!
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: My favorite protein always but........
customer_reviews.text: My favorite protein always! the reason I stayed with Iso 100 is because of its lower cholesterol input, good taste and just 1 gm of sugar! BUT They could be much better if they work in lowing its carbs content and switching from its current sweeteners to real organic stevia. This is the first time I try peanut butter and will be the last .... taste is awful...it leaves a biter and weird taste after drinking...and this is the first time I got upset stomach....I think I'll throw it away...and go back to my vanilla gourmet!!!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Horrible texture, taste, and gave me Gastropub intestinal issues.
customer_reviews.text: I found this protein powder to have a funky taste and it was pure grainy. I made protein mug cakes normally with my vanilla protein powder and this one came out really dry and nasty, and I have made the mug cake with a few different powders and have never had that problem. Also found this gives me severe gadget intestinal issues, the same I get with products containing sugar alcohols which makes me wonder if there might be ingredients in it that they omitted in the list. Don’t waste your money cause this stuff ain’t cheap and it sucks!
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love!
customer_reviews.text: I saw someone online talking about this delicious protein powder. I usually order my Whey Isolate from a different company because of the macros. I hadn't been able to find anything that compared until now. This will now become a staple item in my protein cabinet. I loved how I could add water, almond milk, fruit, or anything and it didn't take away from the Fruity Pebble taste. I can't wait to try the Cocoa Pebbles.
customer_reviews.author: AndreD.

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great. Mixes easily. Relatively clean.
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion this is one of the best protein products on the market. It tastes great, mixes easily and is relatively “clean”. It’s good as a pre, post and even intra workout shake. The Orange Dreamsicle flavor is a great departure from the typical chocolate, vanilla or strawberry flavors. Dymatize has been around for quite some time and makes quality products. Give it a try. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Not cheap, but great product
customer_reviews.text: First package I received had a hole punctured in the side - - I imagine that's the shipping quality and not product. 2nd one was perfectly sealed. Have been getting this powder for years and recommend to all my clients. Blends well with Peanut Butter and almond milk!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Averbukh

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Tastes great.
customer_reviews.text: Orange Dreamsicle tastes great for me. My wife says it has an aftertaste she doesn't like but I didn't buy it for her anyway. The powder has not clumped up and mixes well. Birthday Cake isn't awful but it is nothing in taste compared to Orange Dreamsicle. Container uses a #2 plastic resin and the lid is a #5. In case you watch for plastic resin codes.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew P. Hale

customer_reviews.title: Nauseatingly Sweet
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many proteins and flavors. I wanted something new. There were many reviews about the orange dreamsicle being great, so I ordered that and the birthday cake. I should have listened to the reviews about the sweetness. They are so sweet I can't stomach them. I can barely taste the flavor over the sweetness. It's not only nauseating but it gives me a headache. If you want a good tasting protein, the Syntrax Nectar Strawberry Mousse with Almond or Regular milk is amazing -- tastes just like strawberry milk. Any of the Syntrax flavors are amazing...this was just disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: MF

customer_reviews.title: Cannot Handle The Taste
customer_reviews.text: As my diet plan, I need to fill up my daily protein intake. I considered to bought this whey protein in order to meet my daily protein amount. The product came as expected time. I got excited and tried it on that night. I put 1 scoop of the whey and blended them with milk. I would say the flavor is horrible...I don't think that I would continue to drink them. I think that I will leave it to my fiance to drink it.
customer_reviews.author: Nanabell

customer_reviews.title: EVERYDAY IS MY BIRTHDAY!
customer_reviews.text: I loooovveeee birthday cake flavored everything, and this protein powder does not disappoint. Mixes well with water, almond milk, and more. You can add ice or yogurt to thicken it up, which is also delicious. I even put sprinkles on top of my shakes as an extra treat! Dymatize has been one of my top 3 favorite protein brands for over 6 years. Try it, you'll like it!
customer_reviews.author: DANI

customer_reviews.title: Testing different flavor
customer_reviews.text: I bought this protein a few days by a friend recommendation, I can say that so fart it is a very good product, I really liked its taste, it is not very sweet but not unpleasant. additional the price is good, I will be updating about my experience Updated: about the vanilla flavor I can’t say the same I found this one so sweet and you need to get with something else like strawberry to make the flavor ok. Additional it was more heavy for my body.
customer_reviews.author: fernanda

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time doing protein shakes so I need to get used to the taste but it’s not horrible. I was hesitant on getting this due to reviews I’ve read where people were getting ripped off and only getting half of the jug. Mine came in half emptied as well so I weighed it. As you can see in my pics, it’s all there with some added weight for the container itself so we’re not getting ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: TASTES JUST LIKE FRUITY PEBBLES
customer_reviews.text: Holy wow am I’m impressed. This is a protein powder unlike anything I’ve ever tasted. Tastes just like the cereal...it is spot on. No weird protein taste. Could pass as a milkshake. You’ll love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Ritter

customer_reviews.title: SUPER EXTRA SWEET!! SWEET ,, SWEET SWEEETTT AND MORE SWEET (SWEET)^SWEET
customer_reviews.text: OMG this thing is VERYYYYY SWEET, it is so sweet is disgusting. I'm thinking about returning this item. so much effort to come up with a good product just to out too much sweetener in it? WHY??? The part that i do like is the fact that because is Hydrolyzed is very easy to mix. Please stop putting so much sweet in this stuff. You trying to do work out do things right and this messes with your head thinking you are having a ton of sugar.
customer_reviews.author: CAZAMENDEZ

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgic Enough!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I was skeptical - the reviews seemed too good to be true. Got my protein today and it’s awesome. As a kid who basically survived off of cereal for most of highschool and college this changes my protein game. It smells and tastes ALOT like fruity pebbles. It’s protein powder people so it still has a bit of an aftertaste but it’s still good.
customer_reviews.author: CritiMarMek

customer_reviews.title: Great Fix for Protein
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. i really like the flavor for gourmet chocolate. Probably one of the best flavor whey protein supplements i've ever had. Comes with it's own scoop. Texture is easy to mix in water or milk. This has been really good with getting additional protein into my diet without going into meats and other vitamin laced beverages. My favorite desert at night is plain greek yogurt and a 1/4 of a scoop of this mixed well together. Tastes like ice cream.
customer_reviews.author: PR1299

customer_reviews.title: Arrived opened
customer_reviews.text: I love this product but it arrived with the freshness seal already opened. The plastic around the rim was still in tact but after hearing about other shipments arriving with bugs in them I'm pretty hesitant to use this powder, and hesitant to buy online again.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy if you’re lactose!!!
customer_reviews.text: Everything overall is great, however if you don’t like milk flavor and are lactose DON’T buy this. Very harsh on your stomach! I normally can get away with lactose products but this is very heavy. I’ve been getting by with adding peanut butter to help disguise the milk flavor and my stomach from flipping out. Other than that quality is great and price.
customer_reviews.author: lisser

customer_reviews.title: Did not like
customer_reviews.text: Nope. Didn't like the flavor. I got the Chocolate Peanut Butter because I'd gotten the Cookies and Cream one in the past and thought I remembered liking it. I did NOT like the chocolate peanut butter. The peanut butter flavor is fine, actually quite good, but the chocolate leaves a funny after taste. I will say that it mixes quite well and easy with a blender ball, but the after taste just kills it for me. I wish I could return based on the fact that it's not exactly cheap, and I will NOT put my taste buds through this flavor again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Quick

customer_reviews.title: Yummy Taste
customer_reviews.text: From reading the reviews you already know that this protein powder is one of the best. I love how easy and delicious it tastes. Don't let "peanut butter" bother you because it actually just tastes like a chocolate shake. The only downside to this is drinking the longterm is that it may cause breakouts. It happened to me so if that happens to you, I recommend looking into other brands. I would rotate and come back to this because of the taste, but I can't drink this longterm :/
customer_reviews.author: Lisaa

customer_reviews.title: How can anything that tastes this good be good for you?
customer_reviews.text: This brand was recommended to me for their "Cookies and Cream" flavor. When I spotted "Chocolate Coconut" I decided to try that first. It did not disappoint. The chocolate is the super-flavorful Dutch chocolate, so much better than same-old same-old Hershey's flavor. The coconut adds its own fragrance, but not to excess. Every morning as I take the first sip, I smile to myself and wonder, "How can anything that tastes this good be good for you?"
customer_reviews.author: Carol W.

customer_reviews.title: First time buyer tastes great in milk!
customer_reviews.text: So this is the first time I’ve used any protein powder so I’m not super into the market or have tried anything else what I will say it tastes great in milk and doesn’t taste half as good in water it does have a strange plastic type small from the canister but doesn’t have any taste of plastic I would say it’s definitely worth a try and a good supplement for a meal or for work outs
customer_reviews.author: David Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great for bariatic patients.
customer_reviews.text: I had bariatic surgery the sleeve and this is a great product to use. I take 2 scoops in the morning after my workout and 2 for lunch. I feel that most of the Dr’s don’t educate their patients enough about the importance of good quality protein. Too many get told and pushed to the pre-made brands like premium protein. These are typically untested and don’t have the high quality proteins you need to maintain the not hungry feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: Peanut Butter Lovers celebrate!
customer_reviews.text: I've been a dymatize customer for years. They have one of the cleanest protiens in my opinion. But this peanut butter flavor is legit the best! You can smell the peanut butter when you open it. If you are a peanut butter freak like me you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Poor taste... chemical after taste
customer_reviews.text: Price was good and the ingredients seem solid, but the flavor and overall consistency of the shake is pretty bad. There is a chemical taste and it looks like yellow dirty water when stirred with water. I wasn’t sure if it was just me, so I asked my housemate and he agreed it was pretty bad. I’m a weight lifter and he is a cross fit trainer, so we’re no rookies when it comes to workout supplements. This could be just a bad flavor... I won’t knock the brand, but I also won’t try again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Stein

customer_reviews.title: Protein is great, delivery is meh
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been ordering this protein from Amazon for years. Taste is great. The delivery itself is what frustrates me every time. Last time I ordered this, I wasn’t home so the box was handed over to a gas station for me to pick up and sign for. Now this time, the protein was delivered, but I come home to find that it was delivered without a box and left sitting at my front door. The delivery on Amazon’s part is becoming annoyingly inconsistent. It’s quite frustrating. Anyways, product is great. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Aranguren

customer_reviews.title: It taste AWESOME like a malt
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this at Sam's Club and returned it because AMAZON had it at a better price. The taste is AWESOME and I like all the AMINO ACIDS that it contains. I felt better taking this protein then the others I tried. I tried several proteins and had to return them because they did not taste good. What I like about this one is that it shows all the AMINO STUFF it has in it. I JUST LOVE IT AND LOOK FORWARD TO TAKING IT!
customer_reviews.author: Cowboy Joelee

product_meta.title: Dymatize ISO100 Hydrolyzed Protein Powder, 100% Whey Isolate Protein, 25g of Protein, 5.5g BCAAs, Gluten Free, Fast Absorbing, Easy Digesting, Chocolate Coconut, 5 Pound
product_meta.description: Flavor:Chocolate Coconut| Size:5 PoundISO100 is simply muscle-building fuel. Each serving contains 25 grams of protein and 5.5g of BCAAs including 2.7g of L-Leucine. Known worldwide for quality, taste and purity, ISO100 is produced to our highest quality standards. ISO100 is formulated using a cross-flow micro filtration, multi-step purification process that preserves important muscle-building protein fractions while removing excess carbohydrates, fat, lactose and cholesterol. ISO100 is made with pre-hydrolyzed protein sources to ensure fast digestion and absorption.
feature_bullets: 5 lbs of Dymatize ISO100 Chocolate Coconut Protein Powder (72 Servings)
25 grams of protein, 5.5 grams of branched-chain amino acids (BCAAs), and 2.7 grams of Leucine per serving. 1 gram or less of sugar and fat per serving.
Scientifically formulated, fast-absorbing, hydrolyzed, 100% whey protein isolate. If your goal is gains in muscle size and strength, ISO100 is your perfect partner
Easy on the stomach, gluten free with less than 0.5g of Lactose
With 110-120 calories per serving, ISO100 can help support your keto diet, low carb diet or high protein diet. Add to your favorite recipe or high protein shakes!

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
